units.title: Prepare plate and coverslips
units.text: While culturing human iPSCs, prepare a sterile 24-well plate and place sterile glass coverslips (12 mm diameter) onto the bottom of each well.
units.rationale: Sets up the culture surface for subsequent cell seeding.

units.title: Coat wells with Matrigel
units.text: Add 300 µl Matrigel/DMEM/F12 solution, described in the Reagent setup, per well of the 24-well plate. Incubate for 1 h at 37 °C and 5% CO2 in an incubator.
units.rationale: Creates a supportive extracellular matrix for iPSC attachment.

units.title: Add medium with ROCK inhibitor
units.text: Aspirate the Matrigel solution and add 500 µl of mTESR1 medium and 10 µM Rock inhibitor (Y-27632 2HCl) per well.
units.rationale: Provides nutrients and survival factor for freshly seeded iPSCs.

units.title: Fix organoids with PFA (short fixation)
units.text: Add 1 ml PFA (prewarmed in a 37 °C water bath) and incubate the tube at RT for 30–60 min.
units.rationale: Preserves cellular architecture before downstream processing.

units.title: Incubate plate after washing
units.text: Incubate the plate for 10 min at RT.
units.rationale: Allows reagents to act uniformly before the next wash step.

units.title: Deep freeze organoids in molds
units.text: Place the mold with organoids immediately at −80 °C for deep freezing and store them until continuing the procedure, with a minimum time of 24 h.
units.rationale: Rapidly freezes samples to preserve morphology for cryosectioning.

units.title: Microinject CTB‑488 into first optic vesicle
units.text: Fill glass capillary tip with 3 µl of CTB-488 dilution (front ﬁll) and move the needle tip forward in front of the ﬁrst pigmented area. Inject the solution into the ﬁrst OV carefully, using a microscope. Try not to injure the OV or the surrounding tissue and avoid making air bubbles.
units.rationale: Labels the first optic vesicle for later tracing experiments.

units.title: Fix CTB‑injected organoids
units.text: Add 1 ml of 4% PFA, prewarmed in a 37 °C water bath, and incubate the tube at RT for 30–60 min.
units.rationale: Stabilizes tissue after microinjection before clearing.

units.title: Set up ERG superfusion system
units.text: Set up the ERG aperture and ﬁll the superfusion system with an oxygenated OVB medium81.
units.rationale: Prepares the electrophysiological recording environment for organoids.

units.title: Incubate iPSCs after seeding
units.text: Immediately place cells in a 37 °C incubator at 5% (vol/vol) CO2 as iPSCs will settle and attach to Matrigel within the next 15 min. Do not move the dish for the next 24 h. Then perform daily medium changes.
units.rationale: Ensures proper attachment and recovery of iPSCs before further manipulation.
